alert.note: Alert for Buchanan; Delaware; Jones; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 10:14PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Buchanan, northwestern Cedar, southwestern Jones, southwestern Delaware and northeastern Linn Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1014 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fairbank to Olin. Movement was northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Olin and Morley around 1020 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Wyoming, Oxford Junction, Stanley and Center Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.
